price: You are well aware of the first creation; why do you not then take heed?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ فَلَوۡلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
